remarks: The range of the ` R1 ` function is transitive.  Lemma 2.10 of [Kunen] p. 97.  One direction of ~ r1elss that doesn't need ` A ` to be a set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Mar-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Nov-2014.)
statement: r1elssi $p |- ( A e. U. ( R1 " On ) -> A C_ U. ( R1 " On ) ) $.
